name: LifeGurubyLifeMAPP
0:
”Alexa, tell Life Guru to inspire me”
”Inspire me”
”Teach me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Life Guru by LifeMAPP. By simply asking, ‘Alexa, open Life Guru' or ‘Alexa, tell Life Guru to inspire me' you can find your inspiration on every day of the year.

With 365 quotes and life lessons you will receive simple ways to be better and happier throughout your everyday life.

LifeMAPP is a global mentoring organization who’s primary goal is to bring inspiration and beneficial change to the lives of those who seek to improve their surroundings and support.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
